alert.note: Alert for Hansford; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 5:06PM CDT until May 28 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR HANSFORD AND EASTERN SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 506 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morse, or 16 miles southwest of Spearman, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Gruver, Morse and Texhoma. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
